verbs.description: With [ARG1: federal facilities] [V: running] out [C-ARG1: of room] , the Trump Administration is assessing whether military bases in Texas and Arkansas can house immigrant children who are apprehended at the U.S .- Mexican border without an adult relative or separated from parents .
